message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be highly beneficial for you.  What do you think about a price of $11,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I am willing to pay $9,500 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand the value this product brings, but I'm looking for something closer to $10,500.  Would that work for you?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I am still looking to keep my expenses down. Could we agree on $10,000 for the product?
